attributes.action: Let Daniel stay and live in his self constructed home in the woods!
attributes.background:
Daniel Pike was left homeless 5 years ago due to a nervous breakdown. 
Daniel went to the woods and constructed a totally ECO FRIENDLY home where he  integrates with nature peacefully living. 

The woodland plan to make him homeless and bulldoze his creation. He is doing NO harm. 
let him stay

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Woodland Trust, which is an independent charity. You could contact the Woodland Trust the raise your concern: https://www.woodlandtrust.org.uk/contact-us/
